about_the_game:
• Building A Blueprint Deck

    You can build a set of building blueprints according to your own preference, and according to the different characteristics of each race, which is the most suitable for the passage of the game. Building blueprints will appear randomly during the game for players to choose and use.


  • Develop Village

    During the game, after each wave of enemy attack, you can choose two building blueprints to build your village. You can choose different building sequences according to your preference, for example, you can build more defense towers to protect your village first, or you can upgrade your warrior guild to increase the strength of your trained warriors. Whether or not your village can survive depends on your wisdom.


  • Produce Food And Materials

    Once the village population starts to increase, the amount of food consumed will also increase. You must carefully control the demand and supply of food, or else you may cause a large number of villagers to starve and instantly wipe out the village. In addition to food, you must also produce the materials needed to equip the guards. Use the various workshops to create weapons, defenses, and accessories for your guards to give them more power.


  • Training Guards

    There are four types of guards to train: Warrior, Bowman, Wizard, and Priest. Each type of guard has its own specialty, and you can win by matching different types of guards to maximize your defense.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7+ Lion (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor (Apple Silicon or Intel x64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or greater, 1280x720 resolution or higher.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Fantasy Village Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or greater, 1280x720 resolution or higher.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Experience building your own village with different races in a fantasy world! Produce more villagers for various production tasks and train more guards to resist waves of demonic attacks. Plan the production of supplies to create more powerful equipment for the guards to wear.
